summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6028 for the improvement of Main Street from 6th Avenue South to Maynard Avenue; and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 81600 as amended by Ordinance No. 81767, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
